newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH FIXTURES FOR JANUARY 31 TO FEBRUARY 2.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH FIXTURES FOR JANUARY 31 TO FEBRUARY 2.

text.p: English and Scottish soccer
fixtures for January 31 to February 2
Friday, January 31:
English division three - Colchester v Torquay, Fulham v
Cardiff, Swansea v Cambridge.
Saturday, February 1:
English premier league - Aston Villa v Sunderland, Blackburn
v West Ham, Derby v Liverpool, Everton v Nottingham Forest,
Leeds v Arsenal, Manchedster United v Southampton, Sheffield
Wednesday v Coventry, Tottenham v Chelsea, Wimbledon v
Middlesbrough.
English division one - Bolton v Birmingham, Bradford v
Huddersfield, Grimsby v Charlton, Norwich v Barnsley, Port Vale
v West Bromwich, Portsmouth v Oldham, Queens Park Rangers v
Crystal Palace, Southend v Ipswich, Swindon v Sheffield United,
Tranmere v Reading, Wolverhampton v Stoke.
English division two - Bournemouth v Blackpool, Bristol
Rovers v Shrewsbury, Crewe v Burnley, Millwall v Bristol City,
Notts County v Luton, Peterborough v Walsall, Plymouth v
Wycombe, Preston v Chesterfield, Stockport v Brentford, Watford
v Rotherham, Wrexham v Gillingham, York v Bury.
English division three - Carlisle v Northampton, Darlington
v Lincoln, Doncaster v Scunthorpe, Hartlepool v Scarborough,
Hereford v Wigan, Hull v Chester, Leyton Orient v Exeter,
Mansfield v Brighton, Rochdale v Barnet.
Scottish premier division - Aberdeen v Kilmarnock, Dundee
United v Celtic, Dunfermline v Motherwell, Hibernian v Raith,
Rangers v Hearts.
Scottish division one - Clydebank v Airdrieonians, Falkirk v
Dundee, Partick v East Fife, St Johnstone v Greenock Morton, St
Mirren v Stirling.
Scottish division two - Ayr v Livingston, Berwick v
Stranraer, Clyde v Stenhousemuir, Hamilton v Dumbarton, Queen of
the South v Brechin.
Scottish division three - Alloa v Forfar, Arbroath v Queen's
Park, Cowdenbeath v East Stirling, Montrose v Inverness, Ross
County v Albion.
Sunday, February 2:
English premier league - Newcastle v Leicester.
English division one - Oxford v Manchester City.
